contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=January 2013}} {{other uses|Zaragoza}} {{Infobox settlement |name = Zaragoza, Antioquia |native_name = |nickname = |motto = |settlement_type = [[Municipalities of Colombia|Municipality]] and town |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = Flag of Zaragoza, Antioquia.svg |image_seal = Escudo de Zaragoza (Antioquia).svg |image_map = Colombia - Antioquia - Zaragoza.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location of the municipality and town of Zaragoza, Antioquia in the Antioquia Department of Colombia |pushpin_map = |pushpin_mapsize =300 |pushpin_map_caption =Location in Colombia |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Colombia}} |subdivision_type1 =[[departments of Colombia|Department]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Antioquia Department]] |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |area_urban_km2 = |area_urban_sq_mi = |area_metro_km2 = |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of = |population_note = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_urban = |latd=|latm=|lats= |latNS=S |longd=|longm=|longs= |longEW=W |timezone = Colombia Standard Time |utc_offset = -5 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Zaragoza''' is a [[municipality]] in the [[Colombia]]n [[Departments of Colombia|department]] of [[Antioquia Department|Antioquia]]. {{Department of Antioquia}} {{coord|7.494|N|74.871|W|type:city_region:CO_source:GNS-enwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Municipalities of Antioquia]] [[Category:Populated places in the Antioquia Department]] {{Antioquia-geo-stub}}
